title: Community
description: Share how do you feel, your achievements or support the community with your weekly status.
aboutPurposeTitle: What is the purpose of the Community?
aboutPurposeBody: Healthcare is hard, to receive a good care even harder and to get what you deserve: unattainable! But we have each other, so let's support each other with posts, reactions to each others ideas and feelings. The purpose is to support each other.
aboutRankBody: Engage with our fitness programs or your therapeutic programs. This engagement will creates records which sums together and ranks you higher!
weeklyPostTitle: Share your thoughts with the community
signInPrompt: Sign in to share your weekly update.
